description:
The taxi driver Odokawa lives a very mundane life. He has no family, doesn't really hang out with others, and he's an oddball who is narrow-minded and doesn't talk much. The only people he can call his friends are his doctor, Gouriki and his classmate from high school, Kakihana.

All of his patrons seem to be slightly odd themselves. The college student who wants the world to notice him online, Kabasawa. A nurse with secrets named Shirakawa. A comedy duo that just can't catch a break named the Homosapiens. A local hoodlum named Dobu. An idol group that's just starting out named Mystery Kiss... All these mundane conversations somehow eventually lead to a girl who's gone missing.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Noir
tags.description: Stylized as a cynical crime drama with low-key visuals.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Hip-hop Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of hip-hop, not to be applied to anime that use hip-hop in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazuyakonomoto) | [Website](http://kazuyakonomoto.web.fc2.com/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/此元和津也) | [Official P.I.C.S Website Info](https://www.pics.tokyo/member/kazuya-konomoto/)

In 2010, Kazuya Kanomoto started working as a manga artist with the manga "Spinnerbait". In 2013, his one-shot "Majigumo wa Zettai Ame" gained popularity, and started serialization under the new name of "Setoutsumi". In 2014, he was nominated for the "18th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Award - Reader's Award" along with famous works such as "Deaf Kata", "Yowamushi Pedal", and "Boku Dake Ga Inai Machi". The story, which unfolds in the same place, with only the same two people talking, has since been made into a movie and a drama, and has become a big hit. 

In 2019, he started full-scale activities as a screenwriter with movies, dramas, and Hulu original stories. Currently, he is making use of his unique authorship to expand his activities into areas other than manga. He also participates in P.I.C.S. management since 2018.

[Website](https://www.pics.tokyo/member/baku-kinoshita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mugicaan1) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mugicaan/)

[Website](http://mimorin.com/) | [Profile (Hibiki Cast)](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/mimori_suzuko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimori_suzuko)  | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mimorin.official/) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/mimori_suzuko/)

**Non anime roles:**
- Sangonomiya Kokomi - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Match - Kirara Fantasia (VG)
- Pinkie Pie - My Little Pony Friendship is Magic (Japanese dub)
- Rapunzel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
__Hirofumi Itou__ is a Japanese producer and advertising manager.
